Articles.Content:
I am a big fan of Halo, and have been playing KSP for 6 months. A couple of months ago (pre-1.0) I saw the old ODST Pod. It had a download. [http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/17ba9v/wip_single_occupant_exoatmospheric_insertion/](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/17ba9v/wip_single_occupant_exoatmospheric_insertion/). But now we are in 1.0.4, can someone (Good at IVAs, Configs), try to fix this? In a youtube video I saw, it had a complete IVA, but I have searched through files and found that I do not know what I am doing. Can someone try to make this awesome again?

Things it needs:

A GOOD IVA

Aerodynamics, Ablator

1.0.4 Compatibility

Funcionality

Preferably TAC and JSI support.
Considering no-one seems to be offering to help, can some people just post advice on what they think about it. I might start work on this, but have 3 weeks holiday and Royal Navy training ahead.

So. Actually I saw a youtube video with one earlier today. The made it using some air brakes and then two separations to do the final braking. After seeing this I google searched it and there were a ton of different videos with different ideas. I couldn't find the one I saw earlier but search for "KSP ODST."

I mean the mod one, on Reddit. It was quite easy to find.

I was thinking maybe kduffers might add a pod into his mod, but he has not annonced that.

I know its fun to do it in stock, but this mod looked really good.
